ygData.subject: RE: Favorite Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I *love*my splintering club! Just kidding! Right now I use a 2H Bloodforge hammer. Though I am thinking of finding something else, as it is rather heavy
ygData.messageBody:
Well I *love*my splintering club!

Just kidding!

Right now I use a 2H Bloodforge hammer. Though I am thinking of finding
something else, as it is rather heavy and has a high dly. The damage is not
to bad though, 25 dmg quite consistently. But, as a halfling, I'll admit
that it is hard to swing, as my str is low.

I did use a 1H FS morning star for a bit, and a 2H FS staff. I think I'd
like to get a good 1H weapon again, and some sort of magical thing for my
other hand. I did use a shield in the past, but it has very little affect
on my AC.

So my favourite? I'd say the hammer. But I wouldn't mind getting rid of it
soon.

-----Original Message-----
From: Anne Falbo-Ortiz [mailto:topaaz_ladyjay@...]
Sent: 1999/09/30 11:33 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Favorite Weapon


From: "Anne Falbo-Ortiz" <topaaz_ladyjay@...>

aye yes sianne *hugs* the BI medalion has wis and i beleive the hat does
too, got the med, working on the hat, and i use both 1h and 2h, they are
both at max for my lvl, when i am straight tanking i use the RTS, keeps me
maxed in 1h, and when i am the healer, i am useing the screaming mace with
the orb of slime. as soon as i can i will have an observers staff for my
2h, and something equally as good for my 1h, just not sure on that one yet.

anyway i try to keep them both maxed, and the only real reason to use a 1h
is so yer other hand can be free for a manna enhancer. hope that helped
